javadoc:
The Ghidra application layout defines the customizable elements of the Ghidra application's 
 directory structure.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new Ghidra application layout object.

throws.comment: if there was a problem getting a user directory.
if there was a problem getting the application properties or modules.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a new Ghidra application layout object using a provided application installation
 directory instead of this layout's default.
 
 This is used when something external to Ghidra needs Ghidra's layout (like the Eclipse
 GhidraDevPlugin).

throws.comment: if there was a problem getting a user directory.
if there was a problem getting the application properties.

name: GhidraApplicationLayout
comment:
The Ghidra application layout defines the customizable elements of the Ghidra application's 
 directory structure.
